channel.title: Server Development
channel.description:
Hello,
I am looking for a server and client that may be rare to find but if it is possible to get or is already out please reply to this. I am looking for the original set up for runescape classic. PVP verison - With server set up interface as simliar to the easy rsc. No bugs, No errors, no add ons just the original. Everything 100% working.
------------------------------------------------ I would like to know if it is possible to make the item list bigger, in another words, If I would like to make a Dragon full helm, Dragon plate, Dragon legs, Etc Could I add to the item list and have it so I can summons or set up a drop for it as well. ------------------------------------------------ Client size needs to me bigger with zoom in and out, also probably twice the size of a original client as in web client. Client Would have a load image + Login Image changes beside the images and the size. ------------------------------------------------ I would like to set up a pvp 1 on 1 or clan vs clan area as well, Others have said that it would be know as the pvp tournment, I look forward to have this available. ------------------------------------------------ Along with Pking events, such as at the castle, etc. ------------------------------------------------ Also to make possible a another island, or dungeon or a place to just train etc ------------------------------------------------ Basicially I would like to make a server that maybe the same as runescape once had running but with more add ons such as the pvp tournments and other type of cool features. --------------------------------------------------- Tools would be nice to create the items as well. with ant built in.

item.description:
@Schaffer9688 wrote:

Thanks Darscape, Nice server by the way. Also anyone have any idea on making new items, like a photoshop tool for spirtes. Also adding to the data base.

Sound effects for server ? Any have them ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 26, 2009, 06:46:48 pm[/size][hr]Help ?

Read full topic

IF you figure you want to learn, here is a link with some sources. Next time please browse through the forums before posting pointless topics k.

item.title: Server Development
item.dc:creator: @Schaffer9688 Schaffer9688
item.description:
@Schaffer9688 wrote:

Hello,

I am looking for a server and client that may be rare to find but if it is possible to get or is already out please reply to this.
I am looking for the original set up for runescape classic.
PVP verison - With server set up interface as simliar to the easy rsc.
No bugs, No errors, no add ons just the original.
Everything 100% working.

I would like to know if it is possible to make the item list bigger, in another words, If I would like to make a Dragon full helm, Dragon plate, Dragon legs, Etc Could I add to the item list and have it so I can summons or set up a drop for it as well.

Client size needs to me bigger with zoom in and out, also probably twice the size of a original client as in web client.
Client Would have a load image + Login Image changes beside the images and the size.

I would like to set up a pvp 1 on 1 or clan vs clan area as well, Others have said that it would be know as the pvp tournment, I look forward to have this available.

Along with Pking events, such as at the castle, etc.

Also to make possible a another island, or dungeon or a place to just train etc

Basicially I would like to make a server that maybe the same as runescape once had running but with more add ons such as the pvp tournments and other type of cool features.

Tools would be nice to create the items as well. with ant built in.

Read full topic
